_sText:
Finally I submitted this map to game banana.com. Anyway, I'm just glad I could finally submit this map. Here's the mission of this map: Hijacked Boeing 747 -------------------------------------------------------- There's been crimes of terrorists all over the world hijacking planes to threaten people for the life that is about to be taken. A boeing 747 stands on the gate of the airport. Terrorists, who are in the plane, are preventing the Special Forces to enter the plane. If one counter-terrorist enters the plane, the price will be paid. Counter-Terrorists: Rescue the hostages inside the plane and prevent terrorists from starting their attack. And eliminate any terrorists that stand against the special forces. Terrorists: Prevent the special forces from coming in. Guard all sides to make sure no hostages are rescued. If so, killing the hostages is necessary. Other Notes: There are 4 hostages in this map Terrorists don't get any weapons cuz they do not have a place to buy Credits: Map Made by Roy [NL] -------------------------------------------------------- Anyways, this map only requires only one plane. You guys can unzip the screenshots if you wanna see more of it. And I recommend it. Anyways, this weren't the original screenshots. Cuz they didn't work when I upload them. To view the original screenshots:
Now you can either click on that big green download button...or choose the mirrors here: SCEClan Okay well, download and enjoy. --------------------------------------------------------
